meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a class of organic compounds derived from isoprene, including many important natural products such as steroids and carotenoids.
meanings.sent1: The isoprenoid compounds are essential for the production of various natural substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the isoprenoid structures to understand their role in biological processes.
meanings.sent3: The isoprenoid molecules decided to have a party in the cell membrane.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like an isoprenoid flower in a field of chemistry.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the isoprenoid pigments lit up the laboratory.
